__e: All right, I'm goin' out to get Clara, then I'm comin' back to get you.
It's about time I did something for Clara and the kids.
Would you ask my husband to make sure our guests have something to drink?
Listen, Clara, I never meant to hurt you.
No, you won't, Clara. I know what I want. This isn't as sudden as you think.
For Clara's sake, I want you to know it's never been the way you imagined between us.
You're troubled because your daughter Clara has lost practically everything you left her.
Aunt Clara has a book that has all that information.
I wanted you to think I was the perfect wife for Darrin, and Aunt Clara thought she was helping me.
No, Aunt Clara, you look beautiful.
Clara, you're beautiful and till now they've done nothing but photograph your beauty.
Aunt Clara, are you sure you got all the ingredients right?
Well, darling, it wasn't my fault that Aunt Clara picked the same weekend to visit.
Listen, Clara's free to do as she wishes.
That's when we shouldn't leave, when Aunt Clara gets here.
